dialogue: Suddenly, from within something bursts forth!
This vortex of power... This is the Cauldron of Ascension. This is where this world shall be made anew.
Warrior without equal. Will you grant me thine providence to bring my paradise to all living things?
Come. Let us guide them into truth.
Facetious wretch. Fine. I have taken enough power as it is. I'll do it myself.
Don't worry. When I remake this world, I'll make sure you're reborn as the lying snake that you are.
